text:
March 2, 1959
Mr* Marshall McLuhan, Chairman
Culture and Communications Seminar
29 Wells Hill Avenue
Toronto 10, Ontario, Canada
Dear Marshalli
FTom your letter, discovery* TouÂ»re a Baudelaire fan too! As a
literature and language professor spent nearly a year on him and
other Flench modems.
Also, at other times, Dante, Cervantes, Browning, etc. (a year
each).
More later on Washington meeting, now probably to be held end of
April or about mid-May.
In a rush.
HJS*JO
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
